'Listed' is a pretty little fishing village on the Danish island of Bornholm,
northwest of Svaneke. As of 2012, it has a population of
232. [http://www.statistikbanken.dk/BEF44 "Statistikbanken Tabel BEF44]",
Danmarks Statistik. Retrieved 2 November 2012. Fishermen have used the
harbour since at least 1379. [http://www.denstoredanske.dk/Danmark-
s_geografi_og_historie/Danmarks_geografi/Bornholm/Listed?highlight=listed
"Listed"], Den Store Danske. Retrieved 10 November 2012.
categories: Cities and towns in Capital Region of Denmark
